title: Colloidal properties and stability of colloidal activated carbon: Effects of aqueous chemistry on sedimentation kinetics
content:
Environ. Sci.: Nano, 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4EN00572D, Paper
Ezinneifechukwunyelu Ndubueze, Hardiljeet Kaur Boparai, Laura Xu, Brent Sleep
Recently, in-situ injections of polymer-stabilized colloidal activated carbon (CAC) have shown successful immobilization of per/polyfluoroalkyl substances from groundwater. Performance of an in-situ CAC barrier will depend on its subsurface distribution,...
